Author: xenchain
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: Xenchain On the Blockchain using IPFS  https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/1000/1*IXOZwOR-lD7dTjoQH9-RNQ.png  Xenchain’s latest progress update involves an update to the MVP, where we deployed IPFS nodes and enabled storing of the hash key onto the blockchain.  In addition, Face-Match is required as further security for your personal details. After the Onboarding is completed, the user’s Personal Details will be submitted and encrypt by our Private IPFS Nodes. Subsequently, the IPFS Nodes will pass an encrypted hash which would then be submitted to the Blockhain Network. In this case, the personal details of the user can only be retreived if the user provide the private key, which are created when the user register through the app.  As per the Flow of our Blockchain Solution, it allows our App to ensure that the user’s personal details will be store securely and can only be accessed through User’s Private key. In this case, through the use of IPFS Node, the personal details of each user will not only be stored in one place, however will be spread throughout the node allowing full redundancy if any IPFS Node is down. Furthermore the nature of IPFS would meant that existing personal details will continually be updated throughout the node, further enhancing the reliability. In addition, each personal details is encrypted by the IPFS Node, which in turn is further encrypted by the blockchain network. This meant that every personal details stored in IPFS Node can only be accessed by the Blockchain Network and the User’s Private Key.  For more details, please see https://medium.com/@xenchain/xenchain-on-the-blockchain-using-ipfs-f177d620918a

Author: vincentwhy
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: Xenchain provide mobile SDK (Android / iOS) to perform ID document scanning and Face Recognition check. How it works is the SDK will perform some liveliness detection, capture a selfie photo and send to Face Recognition server to perform face recognition check / comparison with the photo captured in the ID card earlier. If the photos are identical person it will pass the face recognition check.  Tools used for Face Recognition: Our Face Recognition server perform over more than 100 landmark check points to make sure the accuracy of the face recognition results. Face Recognition use machine learning neural network approach the train face recognition model. This process of training a neural network to output face embedding requires a lot of data and computer power and high-end GPU processing power.

Author: dynacom
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: some nice article comparing different KYC project in the market  https://steemit.com/cryptocurrency/@vchong8/e-kyc-xenchain-the-ico-you-need-to-be-part-of  e-KYC - Xenchain the ICO you need to be part of   Hey there, it's Vitalik Chong.  If you are tired of taking selfies and registering non-stop at crypto exchanges just to trade your newly minted ICO tokens, you are going to love this. Each and every time, we log in to a web page, we risk getting our credentials stolen via phishing sites or emails, our wallets hacked or worse our PCs infected with spyware or malware. By simplifying this KYC (Know Your Customer) process, by taking back control of our virtual identity and credentials, we reduce that risks substantially.  I was so excited when Vinny Lingham launched Civic (CVC) token for e-KYC, unfortunately, to date, the Android app only verifies my mobile number and email address. I would have expected that with all that money swooshing around, we would a cool app that does it all.  Well, I found this ICO out of Singapore that is going into the same e-KYC space. They already have an Android app in beta and it's quite simple and cool. It takes back control of your personal credentials and allows you to control how much of your personal data you share for KYC purposes. Think of it as a Facebook type of credential management as when you log in to third party apps with your Facebook login you get to control how much of your identity is shared to those applications. Sounds cool right?  Here's a preview:-  There's more, Xenchain will be working with institutions such as credit bureaus, educational institutions and data owners to authenticate and validate your personal data. By digitizing your credentials online, you can assist in the fight against identity theft and fraud.  Xenchain is now in pre-ICO. Join their Telegram group https://t.me/xenchainio for official announcements.  P.S. I am an early investor in Xenchain. As always, do your own research and don't risk funds you can't afford to lose.

Author: xenchain
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: How Xenchain is adding value by solving problems.  https://steemit.com/blockchain/@maverickfoo/6-reasons-how-kyc-is-stressing-out-financial-institutions  One of the clear solutions for financial institutions to combat this pressing problem, is to outsource their KYC process to trusted, external parties, or extract the data from trusted sources. Xenchain is one of the companies with the necessary experience in this vertical, to solve this issue for the financial institutions. As a matter of fact, as mentioned by CEO of Xenchain, Steve Rao, he believed that their eKYC app can be used across different industries, from ICOs to digital exchanges, and e-commerce to healthcare.  Because it is built and powered by the blockchain technology, Xenchain can encrypt and store users’ personal data on a decentralized public ledger, making it safer compared to traditional storage practice. Xenchain combines super intelligent text identifiers, facial recognition and digital ID scanners with social validation, to create a simple and seamless customer onboarding and ID verification process. Users and Validators on the Xenchain platform will be rewarded with Xencoins (XEN) when their info are being requested and/or validated.

Author: xenchain
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: Xenchain Digital Identity Imagine a world where everyone can manage & control every aspect of your digital identity Whitepaper | One Page Summary  About Us Xenchain accelerates and strengthen identity verification processes by using e-KYC technology that requires facial recognition, making manual document authentication a thing of the past. We creates and distributes XenCoins to utilize the decentralized network of blockchain technology and enhancing personal data security by controlling where the data is stored and who has access to that information.  Problems Current verification methods are time consuming, expensive and highly inefficient for both users and businesses which revolves around physical document authentication. There is also risk of data leakage to unknown parties who can easily gain access to personal information from the traditional centralized storage system.  Solutions Personal data is encrypted and stored in a public ledger making it safe from breaches. Users will have control on who gains access to their information by giving permission to requestors to retrieve it from the network. Most importantly, the data is validated by other users to ensure its credibility before onboarding it into the Xenchain network.  Website | Telegram Group | Github | Twitter | Facebook | Reddit | Instagram | Bounty and Airdrop  Token Sale Private presale for strategic & value-adding investors is on-going, please register your interest at http://xenchain.io/#contact-form  Total XENC token issued is 200 million.  Public Sale 48.5% Private Sale 23.4% Management Team & Founders 11.8% Bounties & Volume Bonuses 4.4% XenChain Partnerships 11.9%  For more details, please see page 27 and 28 of the whitepaper   Budget 1) Product Development and Enhancement - 45% 2) Community Initiatives & Partnership - 15% 3) Business Development & Marketing - 15% 4) Operating expenses - 10% 5) Research & Development Funding - 10% 6) Legal and Compliance Cost - 5%  For more details, please see page 31 and 32 of the whitepaper

Author: xenchain
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: Powered by the blockchain, Xenchain encrypts and stores users’ personal data on a decentralized public ledger, making it safer compared to traditional storage practice. Access management will be governed by smart contract as well.

Author: fumiseki
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: u mentioned all verified data stored in blockchain ledger , so which blockchain u guys used to serve the purpose ? ethereum base ? neo ? ripple ? wave ? or fabric? and tell me the reason why it is chosen , thank you

Author: supernva
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: What makes your project different between other similar projects?

Author: xenchain
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: The XEN token will be on Ethereum. Onboarded data will be stored separately from the Blockchain. The Blockchain contains the hash key and public key to decrypt data stored off-chain, in a distributed storage protocol.  We will be using Interplanetary File Systems ( IPFS ) protocol to store identity data information with SHA256 encryption and IPFS compliant protocols.

Author: xenchain
Title: [ANN] Xenchain - Welcome to the new digital identity empowerment era!
Body: We have our comparison table done, but due to account rank in bitcointalk forum, we are unable to post the link to the picture here. Let me post what Xenchain will offer,  Attestations of PII + validation via trusted 3rd parties Stable alpha version of Xenchain e-KYC application available (ready) Optical character recognition (OCR), facial recognition with live motion capture XenScore mechanism - user's score is determined by trusted validators Data consent by User/Trusted Validators PII stored in user's device and validated data stored in Xenchain network using IPFS protocol
